phrases: The conflict began from a single spark,
and has grown into a massive war.
A multitude of people had myriad hopes and dreams that were at odds,
This is a sad thing indeed.
This war has brought me great sorrow.
I feel both shame and a deep regret over our use of power
that was not meant for us.
and name myself Empress of the Vers Empire.
I also take Count Cruhteo, member of the Orbital Knights' 37 Clans, to be my husband.
We, the imperial family of the Vers Empire, wish to make peace with Earth!
In the name of the Empress of Vers,
I command all Orbital Knights who are listening to this transmission
Was not Princess Asseylum going to found a new dynasty with Lord Troyard?
What about the all-out offensive on the UFE?
We will see which way the wind blows.
Lord Troyard was a lowborn Terran.
His attempts to inveigle his way into the imperial family are offensive.
What is the meaning of this?!
Sir Harklight, we are returning to base!
The princess just declared that they must stop!
The moonbase's forces are still itching for action.
Um, that Empress Asseylum was the princess I remember.
So it is just as Lt. Kaizuka predicted.
Then that cease-fire order was also genuine.
The enemies in front of us do not seem interested in laying down arms, though.
Neither the moonbase nor Landing Castles are showing any intent to cease hostilities.
That transmission originated from Count Mazuurek's Landing Castle.
Or has there been a split?
Count Troyard, what of Empress Asseylum's order?
I did not think her capable of that.
What is truly important is the imperial family's blood.
So long as you still have Aldnoah activation privileges,
can you not still make your dream come true?
After all, this is the only place that I can call home.
Your kindness is touching, Princess Lemrina.
Was that a terrible thing to say?
I have seen a great many things while flying among those lights.
All of it, both good and bad.
Only the immediate future can be seen.
I thought that I knew everything.
Many things unfolded exactly as I foresaw.
I failed to see what was truly important.
What is the meaning of this?!
Why would Princess Asseylum say such a thing?!
Patch this through the command center.
I will address all our forces.
The deployed Stygis Squadron, as well.
Get clear of the moonbase in the next 10 minutes!
Surrender to the UFE along with the Landing Castles!
I apologize for the many wrongs...
May you remain in good health.
Harklight, please escort Princess Lemrina to a shuttle.
Multiple new signatures detected leaving the moonbase.
They are leaving the combat zone, madam.
I thought I ordered you to surrender.
Enemy reinforcements closing in. 10 of the clock.
We no longer have any hope of winning!
Do not throw your lives away!
I made my peace with death long ago, Lord.
Please allow me this one selfish act.
I beg your pardon, Milord Slaine...
But I cannot comply with that order.
We cannot let it end like this.
There is still something that I must do!
I have come for you, Slaine Troyard.
Let us settle this once and for all, Inaho Kaizuka!
No matter how much you predict my attacks, there is no point if you cannot escape.
You are the one who cannot escape!
I do not think it will do any good, but I will ask anyway.
You came all this way to say such a pointless thing to me, Inaho Kaizuka?
No, I have a different objective.
I am glad to hear that!
You cannot do any more high-load processing.
Nao's combat data is stored in the tactical data link.
All units, refer to that and
Barouhcruz, member of the Orbital Knights 37 Clans!
Do you mind if I cut in?
There is nothing to be gained by continuing to fight.
But there is nothing to be lost by it, either.
Giving in to despair is a foolish choice.
You just do not get it!
This is the choice I wanted the most!
Radar returns approaching at high speed!
It is the Tharsis... and a UFE Kataphrakt!
We can limit the direction of their attack!
The rest have been downed by the UFE.
I have fired most of my bullets as well.
The Octantis' right arm is nonfunctional.
It must have been damaged in that last attack.
These Terran warriors are not without skill.
It is Lord Slaine's birthplace, after all.
Do not try to fight an Olympian sandstorm, eh?
We seem to have misread the winds.
I will act as a drogue chute.
You intend to die with me?
They will work well enough as ablative shielding.
Aldnoah Reactor 1, constructed as a sign of goodwill between Earth and Vers,
is scheduled to be activated today.
We are told that Empress Asseylum herself will participate in the activation ceremony.
Research into making activation privileges universal so that anyone can do it is still ongoing.
When that happens, industries using Aldnoah will develop
and will help greatly with Earth's reconstruction.
And as the nation that produces Aldnoah, it should also prove to be
an effective means for the Vers Empire to earn foreign capital.
Dr. Troyard's theories have already been proven,
so we should see them put into practice in the near future.
It is ironic that Slaine Troyard,
the son of that same Dr. Troyard, plotted the assassination of Empress Asseylum,
which was the trigger for Interplanetary War II.
Slaine Troyard's death allowed Earth and Vers to conclude a friendship treaty.
Yes, but there are still Mars Knights who occupy territory on Earth.
One goal of Empress Asseylum's visit is peace negotiations with those knights.
Here is hoping that we will be seeing the prompt return of that occupied territory.
In the hope that this light
will be a bridge of peace between Earth and Vers,
You do not seem too bad.
You really should eat your meals, though.
Is that from when I shot you?
I had a bio-device implanted that was neuro-linked to my cranial nerves.
I do not need it anymore.
Has not it been long enough?
I deceived, I stole, I killed.
I sacrificed many of my own.
I have one more favor to ask of you.
It is what Princess Asseylum wants.
Save him from the chains of misery.
The blue sky and sea go on forever!
I am told that the blue sky is the result of something called Rayleigh scattering.
When I visited Earth last time,
a Terran I had befriended was kind enough to teach me.
